bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Alternative Names jing mai ni xing 經脈逆 行 ; jing shui ni xing 經水逆行. Pathological Condition of jing bing 經病 , menstrual disease, with diminished menstruation and, at the same time, nosebleed, bleeding gums, or even spitting of blood. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry dang gui 當歸 quoting Jian bian dan fang 簡便單方 : 月經逆行，從口鼻出 , “ Menstrual counterflow leaves [the body] through the mouth and nose”.
